title: Understanding 2-D Line Charts
text: 2-D line charts are often used to display data points over a continuous interval or time span. They are particularly useful for showing trends over time.

title: Identifying the Best Use
text: Think about scenarios where you need to observe changes over time. What kind of data would benefit from being displayed in a line chart?

hintAnswer: charting a variable over a number of time periods
title: Analyzing the Options
text:
Consider each option:
$$1$$. Charting a variable over a number of time periods
$$2$$. Charting proportions of solutions
$$3$$. Monetary charting
$$4$$. Non-trendlines
Which one aligns with the primary use of a 2-D line chart?
choices: charting a variable over a number of time periods
